name: Mint - Stripped
description: Make Mint a clean distraction-free environment.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("wwws.mint.com") {

.module.module-taxes,
#body-footer, /* Remove footer */
#hdr-links-help, /* Remove 'Get Help' link */
#hdr-links-tour, /* Remove 'Take the Tour' link */
#mint_turbo_welcome,
#module-advice.module, /* Remove 'Ways to Save' module */
#module-alert.module, /* Remove 'Alerts' module */
#module-budget.module, /* Remove 'Budget' module */
#module-goals.module, 
#module-investments.module,
#module-offers.module,
#module-reminders.module, /* Remove 'Upcoming Bills' module */
#planning, /* Remove 'Budgets' tab */
#save /* Remove 'Ways to Save' tab */
{display: none !important;}

}
